website_summaries.verdict: Popular product from a trusted manufacturer, designed for support and comfort at a reasonable price.
pros: A 2-ply, Nylon/Elastane mesh liner, along with a fresh, durable gusset, lend support and smoothness while still being comfortable
The crotch is 100% cotton, so it's breathable and keeps you feeling fresh
This shapewear can be worn all day
A silicon elastic waistband to prevents roll-down
cons: Popular, top-selling item with overwhelmingly positive feedback
A small percentage of buyers still noted roll-down at the waist

customer_reviews.title: Need 1 for everyday of the week!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but holds everything. I'm 7 weeks postpartum and after having a c section I needed something easy to slide on and off but still effective. This is it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gorman

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very reasonable in price. They feel a bit tight when first put on but are comfortable after a few minutes. I bought one size up and they are perfect. I suppose it depends on your body type, I have a poochy stomach and it smoothed every thing out pretty well so my clothes do not show rolls under them. I am 5.4 and weigh 180 and I purchased the 2XL. I wear size16 clothes or XL in tops etc. Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Boho Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Oh my goodness!
customer_reviews.text: Literally just got in the mail and couldn't help but try on. As you can see there is a huge difference! I'll know more once I try with my jeans, but man does it feel good to not have to suck it in 24/7. Even sitting down it feels great. I ordered a size small which I was hesitant about. I'm 5'2" 155lbs and wear a 5/6 in Maurice's jeans. Going to try this one out a little longer to see if I should get more. So far very happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: One of the best Shapewear pieces I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I don't "love" any shapewear. I own Spanx, and don't mind them. I purchased this because I had to wear a clingy dress for a wedding, as a bridesmaid, and didn't want every ripple or dimple to show. It helped to suck me in a little, and created a much smoother appearance. CON: It is not seamless- you can definitely see and feel the lines on your butt. They dig in a little- not recommended if you have a healthy-sized booty like myself. PRO: An important pro- it does not roll down. It has a gel or rubber top which keeps it in place.
customer_reviews.author: CaylaShopsxo

customer_reviews.title: Not Maidenform - doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not recieve Maidenform product listed, recieved another brand in Asian sizes so I can't even wear it. The band and sewing are totally different from pictured item.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan S

customer_reviews.title: These are a lethal weapon!
customer_reviews.text: Helloooo? I wear an XL in panty shapers but got 2x in these after reading reviews. This is 2 sizes up from my usual XL. Good Heavens! I broke a nail trying to put this chastity belt on! I got them to my hips and tried to pull up, but by then I was turning blue and couldn't get them off fast enough. Seriously, if I could get them on I don't know how I'd walk or sit in these? I'd explode and fly out the window!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila R. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Never bought or used one of these before, so really had to go b reviews on this one!! My son's wedding is coming up & wanted some extra help making my dress look it's best. I bought a medium & large not knowing, and was surprised medium was perfect. I am 5'8" and 145 lbs & medium fit perfect. Doesn't suffocate me, or feel uncomfortable at all, and dress lays fine over it. Gonna add just what I need for the beautiful day!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: REALLY Nice Quality, Fit, Support and Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality shaper. It runs true to size. It's smooth and silky. It offer good support for the waist and the stomach. It has silicone at the waistband, so it stays put. I have an average torso, and it did not roll down. I wore it all day, without pulling at it. It doesn't look super tiny before wearing. It's nothing like a control top on a pair of pantyhose. Of course, it stretches, but this is "real" underwear and it has a nice weight to it. It's a great price and great quality. If ordering, you'll be pleased. Follow the size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Trend

customer_reviews.title: Great until I had to sit down
customer_reviews.text: I measured myself and ordered the recommended size. It fit fine and looked great when I was standing up. I wore it under a slim fitting dress. I got in the car to go to an event 15 minutes away and ended up taking it off when I got there. The top part constricted my breathing and felt odd against my ribcage. I can't wear this and sit down. The model in the photo has a long torso, which I do not. Maybe that's the issue?
customer_reviews.author: TJ23

customer_reviews.title: not good for its worth
customer_reviews.text: On the first trial it felt good though it doesn't completely hide the bulge. I had tried for only a few minutes then. So was encouraged and wore it to an event and I can't even begin to describe the pain in my groin areas where the band cut into the skin. I had a rash for the next 2days. As said earlier, it just smoothened the curves but the bulge was still very much there. It also lead to so many visible seams in the back area and was very uncomfortable all night. Just wanted to come back and get it off me. Not happy, didnt return it due to sanitary reasons. but there goes 15bucks down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have 5 pairs now. I'm an XXL size 18 & I got size Large because I wanted them tight. I even workout with them on. They hold me in great. Nice smooth look and they don't roll down.
customer_reviews.author: Hager

customer_reviews.title: never buy Spanx again
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these side by side with Spanx so I could compare, and these are awesome! I returned the Spanx because they cost 3 times as much and I just didn't understand what the big deal was that could possibly make it worth that extra cost. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: pibblesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Won’t roll down.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’9”, 185# (omg, how did I get so FAT???). I initially ordered a 1xl. Too tight. Carrying weight in abdomen, so I could barely pull that up. I returned it, got 2xl...perfect fit, comfy doesn’t roll down or compress too much. Ends just below bra. No panties needed. Smooths out this belly, until my exercise, eating less routine kicks in. Oh, yeah, I better get started on that!
customer_reviews.author: Mushi

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good shape-wear
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good shape-wear. I ordered a large and they fit well through the hips and aren't oppressively tight in the stomach--just enough elasticity to hold things in a bit. My only complaint would be that if you're doing a lot of moving around and bending over, they do roll down a bit. All in all, I think they're a pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel C.

customer_reviews.title: I purchased few pairs of shaping panties after Christmas and loved them, but I usually order from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Oh My Goodness!!! I purchased few pairs of shaping panties after Christmas and loved them, but I usually order from Amazon, so I ordered these (since mine kept disappearing - daughter and granddaughter) from Amazon. These are positively the best-fitted shaping underwear. I can't imagine who, if ordered in the right size, would not benefit from wearing these. I can't imagine who these would not fit - if ordered in your size. Honey, put a pair of these on. You have packed you stomach in and you are going dancing!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: Best Shapeware ever
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leery about buying Shapeware online , but I read the reviews on this maidenform Shapeware , and decided to take a chance and order one , I received my package today and immediately tried it on , I love it !!!!! I am so glad I ordered this one it really holds my shape , and it is very comfortable , I can wear this every day all day long , The last time I checked my weight I weighed 195 lbs, I ordered the extra large and it fits perfectly , I immediately ordered another one so I should have it in a couple of days , I highly recommend this Shapeware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More like just smooths things out
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. My waist size is about 27" and it didn't really flatten it. More like just smooths things out. Do I wish it would have flattened my stomach more? Yes, but it really just means I need to lose some weight. If you're looking for miracles this is not the item for you.
customer_reviews.author: sicole

customer_reviews.title: Legs too tight
customer_reviews.text: The leg part of this is super duper tight. It fits but is uncomfortable and too uncomfortable to wear. If you have skinny legs and only need the waist support then maybe this will work. I had ordered a M and am a size 8. Stomach support was good though.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen M

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and weigh 160 lbs. My main problem is my tummy. I bought the large, and it fit perfectly. I found it to be light weight and easy to pull up. It smoothes out all the "flab" and it allows to look smooth under clothing. I would recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: sharon mohon

customer_reviews.title: Unless you're pretty thin already, save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. I bought one of these to wear under a dress. Bought the correct size for me and all. It didn't come anywhere close to my bra line and I ended up just having a higher muffin top. It literally pushed everything up. I didn't even wear it out, took it right back off. I don't need an uncomfortable, high muffin top. I ended up wearing $6 panty hose with built in tummy smoother. Far cheaper, far more comfortable, and no muffin top.
customer_reviews.author: KatB

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shapewear I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I'm 5'2" 180lbs and ordered an XL. Very snug (as it should be). Wore all night to a wedding and felt comfortable the entire time. The top rests right below my bust line and has a rubberized band that kept it from sliding down regardless of if I was sitting, standing or dancing. I've even worn them with a more casual outfit and loved how it smoothed my tummy pooch. Certainly not something to wear everyday but is a nice confidence boost when you're feeling insecure about your tummy region.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made. Most of my fat is in my belly and this product does not roll down at all because of the elastic stretchy band to hold it up. I feel a lot more confident to wear the clothes I haven't worn in a while because of this. Fantastic buy!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Tight uncomfortable leg holes.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like these control top panties at all. The waist band kept rolling down. Also it just pushed any fat on my back higher up. The worst part is the leg holes. They are insanely unrealistically tight and the elastic was irritating and uncomfortable. There is no reason to make the leg holes tight when these are made for tummy control. A larger size would have rolled down more and a smaller size would have cut off circulation to my thighs. I didn't return because it felt weird to return panties but I will probably give them to someone else or toss in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Let me freaking tell you this thing sucks so much I got a better one at Walmart ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me freaking tell you this thing sucks so much I got a better one at Walmart this thing rolls downs so bad I put it on and walked out of the bathroom and it was already down so far not to mention it made back fat so much worse. Let’s put it this way my body looks way better without this thing on all it does it squeeze whatever fat you had into one are it made me look like a sausage.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella caruso

customer_reviews.title: Helps flatten my Mom tummy.
customer_reviews.text: I'm about 185lbs with a Csection Mom tummy. While this doesn't perform miracles (only a change of diet or serious plastic surgery will do that), this does help flatten my tummy a bit. When I measured the shaper took about an inch and a half to two inches off my stomach. My husband even noticed. Even though it's not a lot, it's given me some more confidence in my physical appearance. Which for the price of this shaper, is well worth it in my opinion. I've washed it a couple times and it's come out great every time. I can roll down a little depending on how active I am, but usually I don't have to bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: B. DeKo

customer_reviews.title: Get this shapewear!
customer_reviews.text: Wow wow wow! Love these. Must have all colors. I went by the size chart and it fits perfectly. Is comfortable. Stays up somewhat well, but does need adjusting if say you are sitting for a period. Is absolutely comparable w spanx brand but so much less $. I recommend to anyone looking for shapewear that nips in the tummy, hips, and back area where your bra makes those weird rolls. I machine washed on gentle and hung to dry. Laundered beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H.

customer_reviews.title: Does it job well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear with a dress for family photos. It does it job at sucking in and make everything look smooth. I got a large and it fit really well. I am 175 pounds and 5'1. The only thing I did not really like was it was kind of short so it did not go all the way up my back to where I would have liked. It made a little roll on my back that is not normally there. Overall I would for sure buy another or tell someone else to buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Katelc23

customer_reviews.title: Rolls down
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on, I thought it fit as expected. It fit me and gave me the shape and smoothness I was looking for. Then it kept rolling down when I sat so maybe it's somewhat small? I wore it all day when I was sitting and standing up multiple times and it kept rolling down. The repeated rolling down motion gave me a rash (the silicone kept rubbing on my skin). If you don't have to move a lot, especially to sit down and get back up again, I think this may work for you. I definitely do not recommend for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Millet

customer_reviews.title: I’m very glad I chose this pair after looking through several others
customer_reviews.text: I’m very glad I chose this pair after looking through several others. They fit very well, and provide the perfect amount of support and smoothing, while still being comfortable and not feeling extremely restrictive. These DO stay up because the material is thicker than other similar types of shapers. I highly recommend these and will purchase more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: SuzeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: ... am 5'3" and 150 lbs and this was a great fit except the torso was too long so it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3" and 150 lbs and this was a great fit except the torso was too long so it rolled down for me so I returned it. They should make petite sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: VPL is real, but everything else is good.
customer_reviews.text: So this thing holds me firmly, I bought to the measurements. The visible panty line is real, so if you don't like that, you don't want this item. The strange stitching pattern in the lower belly and back hip area made me wonder if this thing would show, but those lines were nothing through khaki pants. I decided to keep these as VPL doesn't bug me as long as the lines stay where I want them (down by the leg where they should be! ). What I wanted these for is tucking up my twin-belly and taming the muffin top, which this definitely does. It makes me a firm cylinder instead of a lumpy flappy irregular shape.
customer_reviews.author: shris

customer_reviews.title: Spanx may be completely losing a customer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! The garment settles in very close to the bottom of the bra, thereby eliminating (or at least not encouraging) a high muffin top. The panty part - from the inseam to about midway to the navel - is less snug, so much more comfortable and less constricting, while the rest of the garment holds everything firmly in its place. Extremely pleased with the quality and the price. If I could change anything, it would be nice to have snaps or a double gusset. i.e. Spanx. I have a healing rotator cuff, so reaching behind and up is a bit painful right now. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JFenn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t roll down like most.
customer_reviews.text: This shapewear is probably the best one I’ve found for such a good price without having to spend over $100 for a full custom fit one. Does not roll down like some do when you move around or bend over. Fits nice and snug without feeling like your being squeezed. I am average built and after 2 kids have that “wonderful mom pooch” ..this definitely helps when wearing fitted clothing. I wear a medium and ordered a medium.. fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: To begin with, it's too small. I fought, struggled, and pulled with a crap ton of effort before finally getting it pulled up. It did not come up high enough so my back fat was MUCH more noticeable, plus, my stomach wasn't flattened in the least. All it did was turn my stomach into a large, tight mound, like a huge watermelon. NOT flattering, nor flattening. Nothing smoothed out.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Calkin

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because I followed the size guidelines, and it is still a bit snug. However, I plan to lose a few pounds and hope it fits better. If in doubt, I would order a size up. It is fairly comfortable and well made. I tried it on under a dress that showed my love handles a bit - and it looks pretty darn good. Update: There are too many seams in this garment that will show through if one is wearing a lightweight dress. Also, the back of it tends to roll down.
customer_reviews.author: zesty

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shortly after having my 3rd child. My midwife reccomended buying shapewear to help squeeze everything back together (so to speak) instead of far more expensive post-Partum wear. So far these have been great! I haven't had any trouble with them rolling and they are long enough for my 5'10" frame (hits an inch or 2 below my bra). The compression is only in the waist so the panty part is very comfortable and doesn't dig in funny. The material is also thick and seems to be good quality. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: Frog819

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! No tummy or muffin top and they are comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is like wearing a sturdier pair of Spanx. I'm rather long waisted and I was so glad to find that it fit right at my bra. Surprising comfortable, yet takes care of that midriff bulge and any "muffin top". The price was a very pleasant surprise! I have both the nude and the black & wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good compression for making waist look trimmer.
customer_reviews.text: I am about 5 feet, 7 inches tall and weigh about 145 lbs. I ordered this in size small and I love the way it fits. I wanted this to be a little tight so that it provides a good amount of compression. I wear this under everything, from fitted dresses to skinny jeans, and it makes me look trimmer and smoother. This does a good job of eliminating the appearance of my belly bulge.
customer_reviews.author: Ma'ama

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black in size XL. They fit like a snug glove on my 5'8, size 14/16 (jeans) frame, and thankfully, go all the way up to my bra line. Another brand I ordered claimed to do this but did not, so these are a replacement for those. Washed gentle cycle air dry. I will order again.
customer_reviews.author: B G Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Great for Post Op
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for support after hernia surgery (for the first 4 weeks I used an abdominal binder from the hospital). I bought these control panties for light support. They don’t provide as much compression as my way more expensive Colombian “faja”, but these are less expensive, more comfortable, and for daily use. These are easy to pull on and off in order to use the restroom. There’s no boning, so they don’t hurt. There’s a silicone strip on top, so they don’t roll down. After wearing them one day, I ordered the same brand but in boy-short since they’re even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Winnick

customer_reviews.title: for lack of a better term, buttcheek
customer_reviews.text: I did not particularly care for these shapers, as the backside of them does not really account for a backside, leaving a gap between material and, for lack of a better term, buttcheek, which leaves a bulge of skin. I also felt like the band of the shaper rolled over several times within a few hours of wear, which was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: DelaneyTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 c-sections I needed a little extra support in my lower belly. I could open my own store with the amount of shapewear under garments I’ve purchased and I was in need of something that was firm - yet breathable- comfortable - seamless and didn’t roll down. I took a chance on this and wow- it’s just perfect! Very Surprised! Great price for this kind of quality. For reference I wear a 12, 5’6”, 45 hip and 34 waist. Just ordered another as I plan to use this for every day control !
customer_reviews.author: LLA

customer_reviews.title: They will work in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find underwear that are white and not cotton. I have several pairs of white or light colored pants that I need them for. These pair will work but they do show panties lines and where the double material thickness meets the single material thickness you can see it through my pants. I can wear them if I put a longer shirt on to cover it. Not sure if they are going to stay up yet but the silicone strip is doing it’s job for the most part. FYI-they are very hard to get on. I would size up so I don’t have to struggle each time I go to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: krisbeau

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet, Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for some slimming when wearing tight and form fitting outfits. I ordered my typical bottom and underwear size and it fit appropriately. Initially looking at them, I thought they would be too small, as I am rounder in the hips and thighs, but these stretched and fit well. They are very flattering and comfortable. The band at the top also did not fold over which was very important to me. Overall, excellent purchase and would do it again! To compare, I am a size 10-14 in pants. I also have a longer torso, but they reached a good spot that was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pizinger

customer_reviews.title: crap in the lap
customer_reviews.text: As seniors become more "senior", our cargo shifts. The tush creeps around to join the mass that settled in the abdomen. No more "junk in the trunk", but now, crap in the lap, In fact, the lap now has its own lap. This hi-waist shaper smooths and reduces lumps, bumps and humps that spoil the lines of skirts and pants. The higher waist also helps support the lower back. I had to exchange the M for L, although I am 5' 7", and weigh 118. For easier on and off, wear a nylon tricot panty under the garment. The shape wear does not bind uncomfortably.
customer_reviews.author: sheilaedee

customer_reviews.title: This is not maiden form
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this seller, I have always bought maiden form products and this is not from maiden form. In fact, the tag was cut and I could see it, it does not provide the support that I was expecting. Moreover, since it was shipped from China I don’t know what the returning process would be. I don’t recommend it at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucks your mom bod in
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down and its doing its job well... the cheek part is comfortable & loose enough where it’s not constricting and cutting your a@@ in half. Top is glued to my skin and not going anywhere let alone down... my only issue... pulling them on and off to use the toilet... these suckers suck you all the way in and its a mini fight to get them down and up lol. I like them though because my leggings don’t roll or slip down once I pull them over the undies unlike some other brands of tummy suckers.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Absolute must buy!
customer_reviews.text: these seem deceptively small at first, don't despair, once you get them up they are great and not so tight as to cut off circulation! These didn't roll down on my waist like some brands, and stayed in place for the whole day! They smoothed out my trouble areas very well and did not cut at the top or the thighs. I cannot recommend these enough! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great for long torsos!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this purchase. I had another garment in this brand before but it was longer on the legs which showed up when I wore leggings so I wanted something minus the leg portion and this was the perfect choice. I am 5’8” 190lbs and the XL fits perfectly on my longer torso. It lands right under my bra line which is exactly what I was looking for and doesn’t squeeze my thighs at the transition point. I will def be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Weimer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT BUT CONSIDER BUYING THE NEXT SIZE UP
customer_reviews.text: If you've ever worn a seat belt that got tighter and tighter the longer you wore it, that is what this panty is like. While it fits great, does everything it should do, it is not a fun experience to wear. It is especially bad when you're sitting down. Because of this, I'm considering not wearing it to my granddaughter's wedding. I want to have fun and not be miserable the whole time. And then there's the issue of wanting to take it down in a hurry. It will look great BUT is it worth it????
customer_reviews.author: lcb

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable! They fit fine. After 2 hours I had to pull into a gas station and take them off. The plastic (?) around the waistband was thick and sharp. Very painful.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Returned because of the terrible panty lines
customer_reviews.text: The panty lines with this shaper is ridiculous!! You could see the line under jeans or under a loose fabric. It fit as expected- I'm 5'4" and 190 lbs with about a 38DD bust and a big booty and got a large. It was comfortable and fit well. Granted, it is a shaper and meant to be tight, so you will pull it out of the bag and see that it looks too small and is hard to get it. It is supposed to be like that! I would kept it if it wasn't for those panty lines honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For photo shoots only
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a high rating b/c it does all that it says it does. It's very hard to get on, but once on - your are looking good. HOWEVER, in practical life, you have to take this off (pull it down from the top down) to pee. That would mean taking off your dress perhaps/unbuttoning your blouse entirely/pulling down your pants beforehand, etc. The best rec I could make to the manufacturer is to have a snap crotch - which would make it a home run.
customer_reviews.author: D. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: I use the heck out of this
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I wear it under form fitting clothes to hide my mommy pouch. It’s really uncomfortable to wear for long periods and it’s hard to use the bathroom but the pros out weigh the cons! Also, it doesn’t roll down on you thanks to that strip at the top!
customer_reviews.author: PeanutPatti

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! I have an extra curved back so everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have an extra curved back so everything likes to roll down but this stayed up no problem. True to size. My hips are 39 inches and I ordered the large.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Still look pregnant.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and take off even as it holds everything in tightly. However, the tailoring is such that you are left with one big round balloon for a tummy. Smoothing, yes. Slimming, no. No waist to speak of. Tried the Miraclesuit Extra Firm High Waist the next day and was more pleased with those results.
customer_reviews.author: Soleil

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: These won’t make your size 16 waist and hips a size 4 but what they will do is give you a flattering silloute without the “muffin top”. Think of it like sucking your gut in all day - but you don’t have it do anything
customer_reviews.author: cbradley

customer_reviews.title: Best for soothing!
customer_reviews.text: This shapewear isn't as strong as it could've been, but it's good at soothing the stomach area. When I was 60 lbs heavier, I ordered the XL and it was tight to put on but it made stomach look like an roll when wearing form fitting dresses. Now, that I lose weight I purchased the large and it fits as stated above. And, currently the XL fits a little loose but looks much better under dresses yet it's not an strong hold. So, I'll purchase the Shape mint shapewear and see how that goes. I do not reccomend this item, if you're looking for an good hold.
customer_reviews.author: EJK

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Although the product fits as expected (I'm 5-3, 126lbs, got Small) it does not really hold the tummy as much as I wish. The back (butt) is not very flattering and marks when wearing a dress so if you plan to wear a fitting dress it's best to purchase the thong one (which I just did). It also digs inside your legs (bikini area) quite uncomfortably. Wore it to work one day and couldn't wait to get home and take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Ju

customer_reviews.title: It works hard lol
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed in the length, I choose to buy this one because it looked long in the picture like it would go up to my bra line. But it doesnt so things dont look as smooth as I wished they would. The hem around the front waist shows when wearing a tight dress. The transition from leg holes to leg leaves a bit of a bulge even though I dont have much soft fat there. The fit everywhere else was great.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...kind of
customer_reviews.text: It works ok. Smoothes out some lumps. It's super hard to pull on and off so going to the bathroom is difficult. maybe just a waist shaper would have been better. But this will help until I start losing some weight. Edit: I have worn this for a few weeks now. It's starting to roll down my back which is very uncomfortable. I find myself having to hide in a corner at work and try to hike it back up. So I'm not really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: The Best of All Possible Worlds
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the shapewear, and for my size and form it did the best it could. Comfortable as possible, not overly hot (even during a very hot afternoon out-of-doors special event), and helped my dress and bottom look good. Only issue I had was the top rolling down slightly (but not as much as I expected it might). Easy to wash and dry (by hand), and retains its original shape.
customer_reviews.author: Littlebip

customer_reviews.title: Good Support
customer_reviews.text: This product fits very wells if you go off of the size measurements in the sizing chart. I am 5'4 and mine comes all the way up to my bra line- which I like because it fully keeps all the skin from rolling. This shaper does come up so high that I wouldn't recommend it if you planned to wear a belly crop top with high waisted jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Marie

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome. I am three months postpartum and about to ...
customer_reviews.text: Ladies - get them! These things are awesome. I am three months postpartum and about to return to work, so I finally caved and packed up the maternity clothes. But let’s be honest, that whole tummy area isn’t what it used to be. This shapewear flattens and smooths everything out as it should be. Perfect under dresses, fitted tees, etc. I loved them so much, I immediately ordered two more pairs. Curreny 5’6”, 170 lbs, and the large fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jade in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Strong stiff material good, but can see pantyline
customer_reviews.text: The panel for the belly is strong and keeps everything in place, but the pantyline seams so thick and tight that you can very clearly see them through clothing, as well as your butt bulging out below the seams. This should be made in a boyshort cut so as to avoid the pantyline problem.
customer_reviews.author: yellowiggle

customer_reviews.title: Challenge to pull up over my gut
customer_reviews.text: The quality seems very good. The size was accurate. Good fabric. However, I cannot pull them over my mid section because the non slip part is supposed to prevent them from sliding down... also makes it VETY difficult to pull up. These may work well fit someone else or a size less than an 8. For a woman with a bigger tummy or waistline.. prepare to work hard getting them pulled up.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Not really any change; couldn’t wear with bra
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i was going to wear a form fitting homecoming dress, and while this did help with smoothing down any lumps or whatever, it didn’t actually make my stomach look any smaller or different. Also, it was impossible to wear a bra with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jones

customer_reviews.title: These are just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a larger size just in case getting my regular size would've been too snug/tight. Ya never know. Well, up size was waaaayyyyy to big. Probably won't order these again not because of the size difference but because of the shiny rubber grip around the waist of the brief. I don't know if that will hold up after over time wash after wash, drying, after drying. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gem for shape wear!
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed by this I ended up buying two of them. Great fit, holds everything in (I am an apple) and makes me look much more attractive. And it does not slip down. It gives me a very natural look. My husband agrees I looked very nice once I covered it with a nice blouse and pants. I have gained weight due to medication and was so depressed. But this made me feel attractive and not self conscious. A very good buy. I am 5’1 and am 190 pounds... so XX was the right size for me. It’s also very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Susan and John, married 28 years

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the Shapeware - very tight leg opening
customer_reviews.text: For reference, I am 5‘6“ and 134 lbs. I ordered the medium. I do not have large legs and the leg opening is definitely tight. Not snug, tight. I found that sitting in these I was actually very uncomfortable due to the leg opening. As well, the material is definitely very hot. On a positive note, the Shapeware does the trick in the sense that it definitely smooths out any tummy troubles that you may have. The Shapeware does not roll down .
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable,  which was very important !
customer_reviews.text: I went to a dressy affair and wanted to eliminate a few wrinkles around my back area,so I put on my flexees not sure how I would feel at the end of the evening. The garment went on fairly easy. So I was pleased with that part. It didn't give me an hourglass figure like I saw on the commercial, however it really did get rid of some of those wrinkles on my lower back . I must say that at the end of the evening I still felt quite comfortable. I am quite pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Alston

customer_reviews.title: runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: This product runs a little small based on the shape as well as the size of your body. It definitely smoothes out the bulges and helps your clothing fit better. Think of this as high waisted panties; you are going have to pull them down to go to the bathroom and that is not going to be easy based on the necessary snug fit of the garment. Don't wait too long to get to the bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Top band is too tight
customer_reviews.text: This shaper definitely provided firm control; however, the band at the top was so tight that it created a bulge at the top on my back. Also, the inside of the band is lined with a sticky gripping strip that feels uncomfortable on my skin. The rest of the garment was great... soft and firm control, but the band was too tight and gripping strip needs to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Finfrock

customer_reviews.title: Tummy Tuck
customer_reviews.text: A panty with extra tummy tuck! Elastic is sturdy thick, the inner seam has silicon to keep the upper in place. Creates a smooth waist. I wear it with dresses, pants, and skirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe should have sized down a little
customer_reviews.text: Its tight but I wish it had more tummy control.. I may buy again just a size smaller and see if that does what I need it to do. Its pretty good for the price.. but I think it was wishful thinking to think it should make my stomach COMPLETELY flat LOL .. it gives enough tummy control that I can manage. I think for ME sizing down might have been better... I cant say I would recommend I just say for TOTAL control ... size down
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Makes a smooth silohouette
customer_reviews.text: Smooths out my belly, great under lightweight and clingy clothing. The silicone strip helps it stay up where it's needed. Size wise it fit just as I expected, not too constricting, comfortable enough to wear all day
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Works great with jeans but gives me a second butt with leggings
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect but wish it had just alittle more compression in the tummy section and if i wear this with leggings or anything tight it leaves very noticeable lines on my butt so i have to try to bunch it up like a thong which can get uncomfortable quick. This usually means i cant wear it with anything tight on my butt area but besides that i wear it with everything else
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Rolled down instantly 😩
customer_reviews.text: The material feels nice and went over my body nice. I stood there excited and said “wow, ok these are keepers”, pulled the tags off and turned to throw them away, instantly the underwear rolled down in the back. I don’t know why I trusted it, I have NEVER been able to find a pair of these style underwear that don’t roll down on me. I’m a 1x curvy figured, small and high natural waisted and these will not work for me. Now I’m stuck with them since I pulled the tags off. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: B.F.

customer_reviews.title: Was OK
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixed review. This definitely slims your waist and belly... BUT, if you have the slightest amount of back or side fat it will bulge out of the top. Easy to put on and off and the material seems high quality. Super uncomfortable to wear in the car or sitting down. Better to be worn where you are going to stand a lot! I had to take it off during a car ride because it was cutting into my belly.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: BEST SHAPE WEAR EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE WEARING SHAPEWEAR! I’ve tried literally every single brand and style and always end up so uncomfortable and can’t wait to take them off but these are SO AMAZING I actually came home from an event that I had to wear these under my dress and I fell asleep wearing them!!!! They give such great support and they are easy to put on and take off best shape wear EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, with some exception.
customer_reviews.text: I have a c section incision and subsequent "c section flap" that annoys the heck out of me and makes dresses and pants fit funny in the front. I didn't expect this to make me a size smaller, just hold in what I can't. It does the job! Only thing is that I have a full booty and thighs so I did have to cut small slits in the front of the panty section to give me some more space and make the underwear line in the back less tight and noticeable. Just small adjustment that no one else can see and i feel more comfortable in my clothes!
customer_reviews.author: mamajschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Helped with my back after car accident.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and received it 2 days after I got in a car accident. I hurt my back on the right side and could not stand or walk well. When I put this on it actually made me stand straight and I have less pain and a bit back support. I am very impressed. I also have an inch or two off of my tummy. I am looking to order a few more so I can wear them every day. I wear a size 2x and I bought a size 2x. It is a bit tight to get on but after it is on it feels great and does not roll down.
customer_reviews.author: Mrsbean2u

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. This product is not represented well. The briefs do not go up as high as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Ororo M

customer_reviews.title: Rolled down
customer_reviews.text: Top wouldn't stay put and rolled down. Returned often and recieved a credit with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bass

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read the description closely enough before clicking “Buy “. This shaper has a super high waist band, kinda where your great grandpa’s pants ride. It’s supposed to eliminate muffin top, but on me it just bunches up around the waist like a tourniquet and is very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phantom's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of shapewear and they were always too tight. This one wasn’t too constricting but it didn’t reach high enough so I did have this roll of fat that was noticeable with tank tops but not with t-shirt’s. I haven’t worn it for an entire day and I haven’t washed it. It did smooth out my hips and tummy which I liked. I’m 5’5 and 170 lbs and got a XL
customer_reviews.author: jamie broomhead

customer_reviews.title: It works and fits well and won't roll down.  Stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: I received my shapewear in a size small. I immediately tried it on with two fitted dresses and it made a huge difference with that stubborn tummy weight i'm working on. It has a good grip and it doesn't feel suffocating. I know there are numerous shapewears but for the quality and price I can see me ordering this one again. Plus it's prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Debmun1215

customer_reviews.title: Definitely sucks you in
customer_reviews.text: It comes up very high waist, which I like but there is some extra material that bunches at the waist for me. I normally have a longer torso for buying clothes so that kind of surprised me. I was debating between the xl and the XXL. I ordered the xl and it is very tight. I will wear it but it's not comfortable. (For refference I am 5'4 250 lbs and normally wear pants size 18.)
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: It feels alright, I wouldn't want to wear it ...
customer_reviews.text: It feels alright, I wouldn't want to wear it all day long because it's tight but I guess that's the point. Not sure that it shapes your waist but it definitely smoothes out the unwanted fat rolls :)
customer_reviews.author: Katya Malinina

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was highly advertised on the Internet, so probably the long delay in receiving it. I expected it to perform a miracle and make me look great - lol - it really is too big which I guess made me feel better? But I won't be wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works, I will say that it does roll down though. So don't expect the sticky adhesive on the band to prevent that. It still rolls down. I am a size 12 in old navy/banana republic jeans I am usually a large XL in shirts. I got the size XL in these and i am glad i did, there is no way i could of fit in the large..
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It stayed in place, didn’t roll, and kept my belly in. Being realistic, it’s not going to turn you into a supermodel, but if you’re looking to smooth out your midsection without paying a fortune, this does that job. I’m 5,2” and 175 lbs. I got a medium which was very snug but I wanted it that way. If I had wanted to breathe easier I would have and should have gotten a large. One thing to note: I have a small bottom for a woman my size. I think if I were a bigger bottomed woman, the pantyline would have really cut in. I hope this helps someone. I know it’s tough to buy shapewear online.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brandt

customer_reviews.title: I have had tighter slimming but this was nice because I could sit in it without notable discomfort
customer_reviews.text: The band hits just under my bra underwire. I am 5'1" and a size 14. I have had tighter slimming but this was nice because I could sit in it without notable discomfort. It helped smooth the mom bod rolls- so I didn't have to focus on sucking in! The band did not roll on me, but it did slip down after standing/sitting/squatting for about two hours- nothing a quick bathroom adjustment couldn't fix. Fabric is breathable but kept my grey jersey dress sweat free on the back on an active 90 degree day!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Stark

customer_reviews.title: This is my second of these and I love everything except the band at the top
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of these and I love everything except the band at the top, and the height of the actual bikini portion of the bottom. For those of us who have the mommy pouch, we could use a tighter fit closer to the crotch and not just the upper portion of our belly. Other than that, it does its job and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Abel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit. I went by other reviews of people ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit. I went by other reviews of people who weigh more than me but are the same height and this was too tight at the top. It ended up ripping on the sides. I really want this to work as I just had a baby and wanted to wear this till my flab was gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I order this to try out, and it does smooth out my mommy tummy. However, I'm thinking these must have been old stock because when I put it on the for the first time, the elastic made a cracking sound like old elastic does. It's not comfortable and I find myself only wearing it when I "have" to.
customer_reviews.author: Book Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Ummmm? Maybe try it...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts into thigh at the crotch area. Too big to really serve as shape wear. Didn’t get to wear it. It will sit in the drawer... Perhaps a smaller size would have worked...though it probably would have “cut” even more in the crotch area. YIKES!! Maybe it’s my “thick” thighs? I don’t generally wear shape wear. So, I may not be the best to review...
customer_reviews.author: affordableautooutletllc

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall people!
customer_reviews.text: 5’8” 150 lbs- not long enough! I ordered a medium and everything is good except the length. I have about 6 different brand/style of high wasted shapeware and this is my least favorite.It only goes about three inches above my belly button. Weird cut off point unless you have no fat on your body which im guessing Isn’t true if you’re buying this product. Good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: AmzonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for postpartum
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for postpartum support and tummy slimming, and so far it’s been great! Makes me feel quite supported in the abdominal area, and really helps smooth out the stomach as you’re healing and shrinking back down. I’m 5’4” and normally 125/130 athletic build and got th small and it was quite difficult to get up my hips (38/39”) but was comfy once on! And I wanted it to be snug to squeeze me back into my pre pregnancy form:)
customer_reviews.author: MamaG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shape- wear
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I bought this to wear under my wedding dress, to me this is way better than any spanx product I tried. It really smooths & flattens your stomach area. Can’t recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pascal

product_meta.title: Maidenform Flexees Women's Shapewear Hi-Waist Brief Firm Control
product_meta.description: We are expanding our fat free dressing collection to target waist problems, this collection secretly slims, shapes and smoothes your body, watch inches disappear instantly, these will surely become the go-to styles in your wardrobe
feature_bullets: Body: 70% Nylon/30% Elastane; Crotch Lining: 100% Cotton
Helps smooth your tummy and waist and give you an hourglass figure
Fabric helps smooth out your bumps and bulges to give you a curvier silhouette
Hi-waist fit gives a sexy look from every angle under clothes
Silicon elastic waistband helps prevent roll down
